text: sum tame evum vicari bethacho ke jannatamam calya jaso jo ke haju sudhi tamara para te sthiti nathi avi je tamara purvajo para avi hati, te'one bimari'o ane takalipho pahonci ane te tyam sudhi halavi nakhavamam avya ke payagambara ane te'oni sathe imanavala'o kaheva lagya ke allaha ni madada kyare avase? Sambhalo ke allaha ni madada najika ja che
